document_data.caption: A map showing Gondwatch Lane and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Gondwatch Lane
document_data.mainbody: '''Gondwatch Lane''' was a small alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Gondwatch Lane was located in the western section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. The alley ran in between [[Seawatch Street]] and the [[Street of Whispers]], running directly passed the [[House of Inspired Hands]].
document_data.Activities: The latest inventions created within the temple were often tested on the alley, charring its surface from countless explosions.
